value.stringValue: Your NPS Responses have been saved successfully
Error. You cannot Complete this NPS Record from the {!recordId.Status__c} Status

assignments.description: Set Date Error Var to True. This shows the data error message on the screen that the user is taken back to.
assignments.name: Activate_Date_Error
assignments.label: Activate Date Error

value.stringValue: Do we look for future opportunities?
Do we support your business needs?
How do we compare to our competitors?
How open & honest is our relationship?
How readily available are we to meet you?
How innovative and creative are we?
Do our colleagues show good work ethic?
How well do we represent value for money?

assignments.description: Set Date Error Var to False
assignments.name: Deactivate_Date_Error
assignments.label: Deactivate Date Error

decisions.description: If all required fields are completed then allow Submission of the NPS on the Next Action screen.
decisions.name: Allow_Submission_Decision
decisions.label: Allow Submission Decision

decisions.description: If Existing Responses were found then update. If no existing responses were found then Create.
decisions.name: Create_or_Update_Responses_Decision
decisions.label: Create or Update Responses?

decisions.description: If a Q13 response already existed before the flow started then Update Q13 in all instances. If it did not exist then create if not already existing (leverages previous decision element logic too).
decisions.name: Q13_Create_or_Update
decisions.label: Q13 Create or Update?

decisions.description:
If Q13 is not blank OR already exists prior to starting the flow then consider it to be answered.
Q13 is handled separately for Create/Update because it's possible it did not exist even when existing responses are used and it needs to be created/updated in this scenario.
decisions.name: Question_13_Answered
decisions.label: Question 13 Answered?

decisions.description: When Question's Response is currently in the Loop? Assign the right response to the right variable to ensure pre-filled fields work correctly.
decisions.name: Question_Decision
decisions.label: Existing Question Decision

decisions.description: Date validation to avoid Reviewed_Date_after_Visit_Finish_Date Validation Rule firing at the end of the Flow.
decisions.name: Start_Finish_Date_Validation
decisions.label: Start/Finish Date Validation

decisions.description: Only allow NPS to be completed if Status = Scheduled or Overdue. Do not allow completion from other Statuses.
decisions.name: Status_Decision
decisions.label: Status Decision

Flow.description: AD-180 - Screen flow to allow for completion of the NPS

formulas.name: f_CEV_Message
formulas.expression: "This NPS Survey " & IF({!v_Count_Existing_CEVs} = 0, "does not yet have any CEVs associated to it. Please add some CEVs by activating the toggle and clicking Continue.",NULL) & IF({!v_Count_Existing_CEVs} = 1, "has 1 CEV associated to it. Please add some more by activating the toggle and clicking Continue.", NULL) & IF({!v_Count_Existing_CEVs} > 1, "has " & TEXT({!v_Count_Existing_CEVs}) & " CEVs associated to it. You can add more as needed by activating the toggle and clicking Continue.", NULL)

formulas.description: Date Value of Visit Start Date/Time
formulas.name: f_Visit_Start_DateValue

Flow.label: Complete NPS Survey

recordLookups.description: Check to see that this NPS does not already have NPS Responses assigned.
recordLookups.name: Get_NPS_Responses
recordLookups.label: Get NPS Responses

fields.name: confirmationMessage
fields.fieldText: Please ensure all information is correct before you continue

fields.name: DateError_DT
fields.fieldText: Visit Finish must not be a Future Date and must be after Visit Start. Please check the date/times and try again.

fields.name: NPSInstructions
fields.fieldText:
Please complete the below questions and click on Save Answers when finished.


If you need to leave this page at any time you must click Save Answers first. You will then be able to safely resume completion of this survey in the future using the Complete NPS Survey button.

fields.name: Progress_Completion_Header
fields.fieldText:
To Submit this NPS Survey all Score and Answer fields must be completed.


Submission Progress Completion

fields.name: Copy_1_of_LogErrorScreen
fields.fieldText:
An error has occurred while attempting to complete this NPS Survey


Please raise a ServiceNow ticket and include this information:


Error Message: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}.

fields.name: Next_Action_Screen_DT
fields.fieldText: Your NPS Responses have now been saved successfully and this window can be safely closed.

fields.name: Submission_Not_Possible_DT
fields.fieldText: It is not possible to Submit the NPS Survey at this time because required fields are not yet completed.

fields.name: Submission_Warning_DT
fields.fieldText: Are you sure you want to submit? Once the NPS Survey is submitted the PDF booklet will be automatically generated and sent to the MD. It is also harder to modify your answers.

fields.name: Non_Submission_Message_DT
fields.fieldText: If you do not submit the NPS Survey you can resume completion of your answers later.

variables.description: Variable to allow submission only if all required fields are completed.
variables.name: v_Allow_Submission

variables.description: Set to True if there was already a Q13 response at the time of starting this flow. Used later to determine whether to create/update Q13 response.
variables.name: v_Existing_Q13_Response

variables.description: Boolean variable. When True an error message is shown by the date fields on the 1st screen.
variables.name: v_ShowDateErrorMessage_Boolean
